Class ConfirmationTokenServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.confirmationtokenservice.service.ConfirmationTokenServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfirmationTokenService
@Service
public class ConfirmationTokenServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfirmationTokenService
Service implementation for managing confirmation tokens in the database

    • generateAndSaveToken

      public java.lang.String generateAndSaveToken​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Generates and saves a confirmation token object in the database for a supplied user id, then returns token string
      Specified by:
      generateAndSaveToken in interface ConfirmationTokenService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to create and save a confirmation token.
      Returns:
      the token string for the generated confirmation token.

    • confirmTokenAndGetUserId

      @Transactional public java.util.UUID confirmTokenAndGetUserId​(java.lang.String token)
      Finds a confirmation token based on token string, sets the token to confirmed and retrieves user id.
      Specified by:
      confirmTokenAndGetUserId in interface ConfirmationTokenService
      Parameters:
      token - the token string for the confirmation token to set to confirmed
      Returns:
      the user id of the newly confirmed token
      Throws:
      ConfirmationTokenException - if confirmation token is not found, token has expired or the user id already has a confirmed token

    • deleteAllConfirmationTokensByUserId

      public void deleteAllConfirmationTokensByUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Deletes all tokens for the supplied user id
      Specified by:
      deleteAllConfirmationTokensByUserId in interface ConfirmationTokenService
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to delete all confirmation tokens

    • getTokenFromDatabase

      private ConfirmationToken getTokenFromDatabase​(java.lang.String token)
      Helper method to retrieve confirmation token from database
      Parameters:
      token - the token string for which to retrieve a confirmation token object
      Returns:
      the confirmation token for the supplied token string
      Throws:
      ConfirmationTokenException - with status NOT_FOUND if token is not found

    • validateNoTokenConfirmedForUserId

      private void validateNoTokenConfirmedForUserId​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Helper method to validate that the user doesn't have any confirmed tokens already
      Parameters:
      userId - the user id for which to validate that no tokens have been confirmed
      Throws:
      ConfirmationTokenException - with status CONFLICT if any confirmed token is found for the supplied user id

    • validateTokenNotExpired

      private void validateTokenNotExpired​(ConfirmationToken confirmationToken)
      Helper method to validate that a token is not expired
      Parameters:
      confirmationToken - the confirmation token to validate not expired
      Throws:
      ConfirmationTokenException - with status GONE if token is not valid
